TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TextBoxRenderer extends System.Object
public ref class TextBoxRenderer abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextBoxRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于呈现具有视觉样式的文本框控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a text box control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一组 `static` 方法，这些方法可用于呈现具有操作系统的当前视觉样式的文本框控件。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a text box control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 如果要绘制的自定义控件应具有当前视觉样式的外观，此方法非常有用。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要绘制文本框，请使用其中一种 方法。To draw a text box, use one of the methods. 这些方法提供了各种选项，例如应用文本格式设置或指定文本边界。These methods provide a variety of options, such as applying text formatting or specifying text bounds. 如果在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区， 将绘制具有当前视觉样式的文本框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, will draw the text box with the current visual style. 否则， 将引发 。Otherwise, will throw an . 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，可以检查属性的值 。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 此类包装 设置为类的元素之一的的功能 。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements of the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [用视觉样式呈现控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用方法绘制文本框的自定义控件 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the method to draw a text box. 该控件还允许用户选择 要应用于文本框文本的值之一。The control also allows the user to select one of the values to apply to the text box text. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 绘制具有操作系统的当前视觉样式的文本框控件。

span.span: Draws a text box control with the current visual style of the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用此方法之前，应验证属性是否 返回 `true` 。Before calling this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`.

exception.span: 操作系统不支持视觉样式。

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-

exception.span: 用户在操作系统中禁用视觉样式。

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-

exception.span: 视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
